titlestmt.author: Processed by: Kimberly Sims; machine-readable finding aid created by: Kimberly Sims

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Tarheel Leather Club NewsLetters, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Tarheel Leather Club Newsletters were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift in 1993.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Tarheel Leather Club is a gay and lesbian leather club in North Carolina.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The collection is a spiral-bound volume of newsletters produced between 1990-1992.

did.unittitle: Spiral bound photocopies of two newsletters produced by Triangle Area, N.C. gay and lesbian leather club: the Tarheel Leather Club News, and the Tar and Feathers.
